page.title: 15A Day in the Life of my Mum
page.content: On a Saturday my mum gets up at about a quarter past seven so that she may watch TV-am and have her breakfast and a cup of tea. Then if she is not already dressed she goes upstairs to dress and get ready for work. She works from ten until one in the afternoon when she comes home for dinner and does the washing up,washing and housework. That takes till twenty past three when she comes to fetch my sisters and me from the garden outside to have a drink of orange and a biscuit. We turn on the T.V. to see what's on. If it's wrestling my dad watches but if it's football it goes straight off. We have tea at five then have the T.V. back on. We have a bedtime drink after nine and go to bed at ten. My mum goes to bed at eleven.
